channel.title: Project (Unknown) - Daily Updates - Suggestions - New server base - Download
channel.description:
[b]Welcome + Introduction[/b] Welcome to my new project, I have been working on this for a few days, again I have said nothing to no one. The server is coming a long well and hopefully I will be adding more to it soon. I have been creating runescape private server for around 3 to 4 years now, I have created many, some succesful and some that just didn't do quite as good. I have also been learning a little PHP and HTML in this time and used SMF to learn more about the way forums are created.
[b]Server development and base[/b] For now I will be using a Very basic server I myself will create, so far there is hardly anything and I am looking at adding a combat handler in the next few hours. The server has log in and log off feature, there is no player rendering yet but I am looking into that as I'm posting this thread. I am in need of suggestions for this server, a server name is also required.
[b]Why are you creating this server?[/b] I'm really bored of just chaning the features of a server that has been released, I think it would be a good thing if moparscape started to learn a little more and create their own private servers. I am also creating this for education purposes and hopefully will carry on learning after this developent is thru.
[b]Will I beable to play this server?[/b] No. The server will not be hosted by me, I am creating a server base as I said before, and will add some modification to it for other people to build off it. I will be releasing the server in the download section when I have added most of the features.
[b]What are you looking to add?[/b] I am in need of suggestions for this private server, I want to know your ideas and what you would like to see in a private server, as of now there is little added to the server.
[b]You said there little added to the server, so what have you added?[/b] I have added a player login, unfortunatly I have not started on the player rendering or walking yet, I also added a log out feature that does not yet save the character file.
[b]Where are the pictures?[/b] I am currently busy with the server, when I finish player rendering I will post some pictures.
[b]Pictures[/b] Not much added, I have got the player rendering and the character design working now. [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/untitled-2.jpg[/img]
This is what the CMD produces when the server is online [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/CMD.jpg[/img]

item.title: Project (Unknown) - Daily Updates - Suggestions - New server base - Download
item.dc:creator: @new_IoSession new IoSession();
item.description:
@new_IoSession wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:20, topic:280999”][quote author=new IoSession(); link=topic=371093.msg2810454#msg2810454 date=1243967504]

It’s my own, I’ve been developing it slowly these past few days.

No it’s not you fucking idiot. This is RuneFusion made by Blake of google.

…Lol. No it’s not.
He is making his own source…
What’s your proof that it’s runefusion?
“Omfg l00k 13at th3r f1rst 3 scr33n! 1t35 cha4arctr cuast0mzation!”
Nope. You have no proof. It’s a simple interface you can call.

It’s RuneFusion you fucking idiot.

http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=58993&highlight=RuneFusion

How do you know that?

Because I know what RuneFusion looks like. And this is the same as RuneFusion.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2009, 12:32:39 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Efilite link=topic=371093.msg2808784#msg2808784 date=1243876395]
No this was created by me, I did take a few things out of the server I admit, only because I ain’t so experianced in Java yet
[/quote]

You don’t know shit of Java. There’s your excuse.
[/quote]
Oh, you were looking at the command prompt?[/quote]

No fool, He released this.

Read full topic

item.title: Project (Unknown) - Daily Updates - Suggestions - New server base - Download
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

Welcome + Introduction
Welcome to my new project, I have been working on this for a few days, again I have said nothing to no one. The server is coming a long well and hopefully I will be adding more to it soon.
I have been creating runescape private server for around 3 to 4 years now, I have created many, some succesful and some that just didn’t do quite as good. I have also been learning a little PHP and HTML in this time and used SMF to learn more about the way forums are created.

Server development and base
For now I will be using a Very basic server I myself will create, so far there is hardly anything and I am looking at adding a combat handler in the next few hours. The server has log in and log off feature, there is no player rendering yet but I am looking into that as I’m posting this thread. I am in need of suggestions for this server, a server name is also required.

Why are you creating this server?
I’m really bored of just chaning the features of a server that has been released, I think it would be a good thing if moparscape started to learn a little more and create their own private servers. I am also creating this for education purposes and hopefully will carry on learning after this developent is thru.

Will I beable to play this server?
No. The server will not be hosted by me, I am creating a server base as I said before, and will add some modification to it for other people to build off it. I will be releasing the server in the download section when I have added most of the features.

What are you looking to add?
I am in need of suggestions for this private server, I want to know your ideas and what you would like to see in a private server, as of now there is little added to the server.

You said there little added to the server, so what have you added?
I have added a player login, unfortunatly I have not started on the player rendering or walking yet, I also added a log out feature that does not yet save the character file.

Where are the pictures?
I am currently busy with the server, when I finish player rendering I will post some pictures.

Pictures
Not much added, I have got the player rendering and the character design working now.

This is what the CMD produces when the server is online

Read full topic
item.source: Project (Unknown) - Daily Updates - Suggestions - New server base - Download
